reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was not sure if this was going to be what I wanted. The expansion size was perfect, allowing room for large documents that are too bulky for regular folders. A double treat to see the document and have an easy clear pocket to label.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very helpful to organize files
reviews.reviewText: I have found these perfect for organizing financial paperwork. They are large enough but not overly large and are great for tax papers and receipts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: First of all, I was surprised how well these are made for the money! I like that the expandable bottom is fabric not plastic. I like the removable identification card so u can replace it, if need be, later. They are large and roomy. I think the snap is very solidly applied.The plastic is pliable but sturdy and easily accessible. The design is perfect. I am very happy with these folders and especially the price per item . I'm ordering more! I highly recommend these .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Quality, price and usage.
reviews.reviewText: Nothing to this like with the item. Personnal use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great assets to keep art room tidy
reviews.reviewText: Folders are a good large size. The different colors enables me to sort and file the various papers used in my collage art by color. Each folder is well made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty colors ..not that it was part of the criteria i ordering folders. 😀
reviews.reviewText: Very sturdy & served my purpose organizing paper work & then added to a beautiful storage box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I use these to separate art activities by month and they have saved me so much headache when im trying to plan afternoon activities in my classroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The snaps are not very durable
reviews.reviewText: These are nice and colorful and transparent so you can see what's inside. The only thing that I felt was wrong was the snaps were very very cheap. I feel like they will break after a couple times of use. Other than that this is a good product
